data.title: Pawandeep Rajan: Biography, Wife, Songs, Marriage, Singer

data.text:
Pawandeep Rajan

Pawandeep Rajan is a popular singer from India. He is known by the name Pawan among his followers and family. He is a lyricist and vocalist. As a singer, he also released solo albums and appeared in films. He began his singing career in 2015, and he made his television debut on the singing reality show The Voice India, which he won. After winning Sony TV's Indian Idol season 12 reality shows, he has gained even more prominence.

Personal Life

He was born on 27 July 1996 in India. His hometown is Champawat, Uttarakhand, India. He is from the Indian Ocean. He considers Hinduism as his faith. He started her singing career by winning the Voice of India competition in 2015, and since then, he has worked in the music industry. After studying at Senior Secondary School, he graduated from Kumaun University in Nainital, India.

Pawandeep Rajan Career

Pavandeep has always enjoyed singing, and during his undergraduate years, he saw an advertisement for "The Voice India" show audition. In 2015, Pawandeep competed in Himesh Reshammiya's "The Voice India" alongside Sunidhi Chauhan, Shaan, and Mika Singh and won the event with a prize of Rs 50 lakh, a car, and a recording deal. Recently he won the Sony TV show Indian Idol 12. After being in the limelight, he started recording his album.

Pawandeep Rajan Education

He graduated from Kumaun University in Nainital and completed his schooling at University Senior Secondary School.

Physical Appearance

His shoe size is 8.5, and his height is 5 feet 7 inches. His background is Asian. He was born under the zodiac sign of Leo. His hair and eyes are also black. According to his zodiac sign, his lucky numbers are 1, 5, 9, and his lucky stones are Ruby and Amber. Golden, Orange, and Red are his lucky colors.

Family and Friend

Pawandeep Rajan comes from a family of musicians. Suresh Rajan, a well-known folk singer, is his father's name. Jyoti Rajan and Chandni Rajan are two of his sisters.

Pawan is recognized for being the group's friendliest member. In his recent Indian Idol episode, he met some fantastic friends. He indicated that he has a small group of friends who have grown like family to him.

Relationships

Pawandeep is currently single, although rumor has that he is dating Arunita Kanjilal, a contestant on Indian Idol season 12. They've always been spoken about for their romantic compatibility and because they're both good singers. He indirectly expressed his love for her in a recent show, leaving speechless the judges and the public.

Favorite Things

Homemade meals such as Aloo Parantha, Vegetables, Cheese, Palak Paneer, and others are his favorites. Juice, tea, and coffee are among his favorite juices. Shaan, a very well singer, is his favorite.

Hobby of Pawandeep Rajan

He has a wide range of interests. He enjoys playing the piano, guitar, drums, tabla, etc. He enjoys going on vacations, shopping, and watching movies. He also loves tattoos.

Awards and Achievements

In 2015, he won the reality program "Voice of India". He was selected as Uttarakhand's youth brand ambassador. He also won the Indian Idol competition in 2021.

Interesting Facts about Pawandeep Rajan

Pawandeep is also a member of the Chandigarh-based band 'Rait,' in which he is the lead singer.

His father is a well-known folk musician.

For the film Romeo and Bullet, he performed the romantic song "Tere Liye."

Pawan is a deep-minded person. Rajan's arms have tattoos on both sides.

He received the title of youngest tabla player when he was two years old.

He collaborated with Aron Haroon Rashid in 2016 and contributed two songs to Aron's CD.

With Universal Music Group, he had his first chance to release an album.

He enjoys playing a variety of instruments in addition to singing.

Two weeks before participating in The Voice India, Pawandeep took singing lessons.

After joining the competition, he began training with an Indian musician named Shaan (The Voice India).

House

In Mumbai, Maharashtra, India, he has a luxurious home.

Cars

He has a winning price of an Alto K2 car and a MAHINDRA XUV 500 car. Both cars are quite expensive.

Social Media

Among the many social media platforms, he is active on Instagram. His Instagram account, @pawandeeprajan, has a million followers. He also has his own YouTube channel.

Conclusion

We have provided detailed information about Pawandeep Rajan: Family, Career, Girlfriend, Physical Appearance, Favorite Things, and Facts about him.
